It does not matter how bad the target is. He takes the job, kills the mark, gets paid, and that is the end of it. The only things he believes in are his own skills and money.\n\nThen one day, a sudden high paying request comes in from a regular client. Five million dollars, with a single condition: Kill Kang Il-hyun and retrieve one item from his safe.\n\nThe target is the son of Korea’s crime syndicate kingpin. Kang Il-hyun is a man with sharp, serpentine eyes. Standing inside a trap Il-hyun has laid out, Ja-kyung finds himself slowly being cornered, the noose tightening around his neck.\n\n“I heard a very interesting story while I was on a business trip to Hong Kong.”\n“……”\n“Aren’t you curious what that interesting story is?”\n“Someone’s trying to kill me. In my own house, no less.”\n“Explain it. I’ll decide whether to believe you after I hear it.”\n\nWill Ja-kyung succeed in killing Kang Il-hyun and completing the job, or will he meet a pointless death himself?\n\nA battle between men who would not be surprising to see dead at any moment has begun."},"links":{"mu":"sy2l717","raw":"https://ridibooks.com/books/4895003169?\u0026type=buy#series_price_type"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"pornographic","tags":[{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"85daba54-a71c-4554-8a28-9901a8b0afad","name":{"en":"Mafia"}},{"id":"97893a4c-12af-4dac-b6be-0dffb353568e","name":{"en":"Sexual Violence"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Она мечтала о том, чтобы место, где ей удастся укрыться, было настоящим раем. Роель, гостившая в доме своих родственников, оказалась в ужасной ситуации: ей довелось убить своего двоюродного брата, который попытался напасть на неё посреди ночи. В смятении и отчаянии она покинула деревню, стремясь скрыть своё преступление, и нашла укрытие в кладовке одинокой хижины в горах, прячась в холодных и опасных тропах.\nТам перед ней появился импозантный мужчина по имени Кайден.\n«Если не хочешь замёрзнуть до смерти, раздевайся.»\n«Говорят, волнение прогоняет холод. Лучше так, чем заболеть, не правда ли?»\n\nЕсли она не хочет замёрзнуть в этом покрытом снегом лесу, у неё нет выбора, кроме как остаться в хижине, где живёт он. Станет ли это место раем для Роель? Или же оно превратится в ещё один ад?","th":"\"ที่สุดปลายของฤดูหนาวอันแสนโหดร้ายนี้ เธอจะได้พบกับสรวงสวรรค์ไหมนะ…?\" หลังจากพลั้งมือฆ่าลูกพี่ลูกน้องที่บุกเข้ามาจะทำมิดีมิร้าย โรเอล ตัดสินใจวิ่งหนีออกจากบ้านญาติที่เธออาศัยอยู่มาทั้งชีวิตด้วยความตื่นตระหนกและหวาดกลัวไปยังผืนป่าที่มีเพียงหิมะหนาทึบปกคลุม โดยที่เธอไม่คาดคิดมาก่อนเลยว่าเส้นทางนั้นจะพาเธอมาที่กระท่อมลึกในป่า ที่ ๆ เธอได้พบกับ ไคเดน ชายหนุ่มรูปร่างสูงใหญ่และน่าหวาดเกรงพอ ๆ กับพายุหิมะด้านนอกนั่น \"ถ้าไม่อยากแข็งตายก็ถอดออก\" \"ว่ากันว่าความตื่นเต้นจะทำให้ความหนาวหายไป ก็ดีกว่าเป็นไข้ไม่ใช่เหรอ?\" เห็นที โรเอล จะไม่สามารถออกไปจากกระท่อมที่มีเขาอยู่ได้ เว้นเสียแต่ว่าเธอจะอยากออกไปแข็งตายท่ามกลางหิมะ สุดท้ายแล้ว ที่แห่งนี้จะเป็นสวรรค์หรือนรกขุมใหม่สำหรับเธอกันแน่?","zh-hk":"在冬季的尾聲，羅艾爾選擇逃走。 她曾希望逃亡之地能成為她的避風港。 在親戚家寄宿的她，某天晚上殺了對她伸出狼爪的表弟。 她帶著驚慌與罪惡感逃出村莊，藏身於寒冬山中一座無人木屋內。 就在這時，一名高大男子出現了──凱登。 「不想凍死的話，就把衣服脫掉。」 「人一興奮就不會冷了，總比感冒還好吧。」 在這場大雪中，離開那間小屋，意味著死亡。 但留在這裡，她真的能活下來嗎？ 對她而言，這是天堂，還是另一個地獄？"},"links":{"ap":"a-winter-cabin-of-serenity-and-insanity","engtl":"https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/a-winter-cabin-of-serenity-and-insanity-m","mu":"rizt3jo","nu":"towards-the-winter-cabin-of-serenity-and-madness-cinderella-runs","raw":"https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/tranquil_crazy_cottage"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

This is just the part of the contract!”\n___\nPossessing a villainess who would be brutally murdered by a crazed male lead, my only way to survive is to tame him and take him to the female lead.\n\nCan this plan with a cruel and charming, yet incomprehensible beast be succeed? However, the expression of the beast has been gradually changing.\n\n\"I promised. When I become human, you will be my woman.\"\n\nHis words sounded more serious than ever, similar to the firmness he exerted to keep me in his arms. Somehow those words also shook my heart. Don't get upset, Floria. Then, a beautiful young court painter, Mephis, appears before her. \"Your Majesty, would you please keep me?\" At first, the words sounded casual, but before you know it, they turn into a heart-wrenching confession.","fr":"Dans un monde où les mariages arrangés sont la norme, Daphné a épousé son premier amour et est devenue impératrice. 4de7ec73-15a5-4398-9521-0548efc70bca:::||@!@||:::2025-12-29T02:20:54:::||@!@||:::{"id":"4de7ec73-15a5-4398-9521-0548efc70bca","title":{"ko-ro":"Agyeok Hwangnyeonim-i Manghal Gisadan-eul Sallim"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"악역 황녀님이 망할 기사단을 살림"},{"en":"The Villainous Princess Saves the Doomed Knights"}],"description":{"en":"*This is a promotional oneshot for a novel of the same name.*\n____\nI transmigrated into a fantasy novel where the male protagonist, in his attempt to save the world, loses his comrades one by one, leading to eventual destruction. My role is a villainous princess with an excessively innocent mind. I obsess over the male lead, pick fights, and eventually die in a demon attack, thus plunging the reputation of the knight order the male lead belongs to into ruin... \n\n'Oh, this isn't a knight order, it's a rabble!' I looked around at the disheveled knights with a dumbfounded expression. \n\n\"Sir, Are you properly contracted? What about overtime pay? Is there any compensation in case of accidents? How about medical support for mental stress and physical injuries?\"  \n\"Why are you suddenly asking this, Your Highness?\" The male lead asked me suspiciously. Well, I once obsessively pursued him, so I understand his wariness.   \n\"You should call me 'Administrator' instead of 'Your Highness'.\"   \n\"No, that's...\"   \n\"Kashia Astrid, as of today, you've been assigned as the administrative supply officer for the Azure Radiance Knights.\" I smiled sweetly at the bewildered male lead.   \n\"Also, please rest assured, I'll no longer obsess over you anymore.\" His looks? Obsession? Sweet and bitter romance? What use are those when the world is on the brink of destruction!   \n\"If you keep this up, I might accidentally send a letter of complaint to the Emperor about this matter.\" Playing the villainess, I even slapped him in the commander's office.   \n\"Hey, do you want us to wash your socks too? Do you lose your hands? Huh?\" I even confronted the absurd military culture.   \n\"Don't be discouraged, it's not your fault.\" I comforted the mentally shattered future saviors. \n\n\"Hurrah for the Administrative Supply Officer!\"   \n\"You're our savior!\"   \n\"Hail, Kashia!\"   \n...Why did our knights turn into my fan club? And on top of that...   \n\"The Administrator will never leave us. Umezu drew the first and second halves, while Mizutani drew the middle. Umezu and Mizutani were members of a manga circle called the \"Kaiman Club,\" and Umezu asked them to collaborate. The original work is the Grimm fairy tale \"Hansel and Gretel,\" but the adaptations are reminiscent of Umezu, who would later become a master of horror. The detailed depictions of the backgrounds and other works are astonishing, demonstrating the extraordinary artistic ability of this precocious genius. *The e-book version does not include the \"Readers for 'Brother and Sister in the Forest' and 'Bottomless Town'.\""},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/%E6%A3%AE%E3%81%AE%E5%85%84%E5%A6%B9-%E6%A5%B3%E5%9B%B3%E3%81%8B%E3%81%9A%E3%81%8A-ebook/dp/B077NYCK6H?psc=1\u0026aod=1\u0026oCode=B077NYCK6H","bw":"dee2775ec6-108a-41c3-a3c8-f354a0b2da68","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/432346/","mu":"t61b8rk"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Now it’s constant tiptoeing to avoid being found out while plotting how to protect the hero… and somehow there’s always time for strawberry cake.\n\nA cozy, chaos-filled tale of a secretive “maknae” with a lot to hide.","ko":"마법사 소년병으로 개고생하던 전쟁터에서 전생의 기억이 떠올랐다.\n그리고 이곳이 \u003c폐허 위에 꽂은 검\u003e 소설 속이라는 것도.\n하필이면 종말의 몰살엔딩이 예정된 전쟁 소설 속에 빙의했냐고!!\n\n끔찍한 결말을 피하자면 ‘영웅’ 레비아탄 제베르트 옆에 딱 붙어\n그가 죽지 않도록 잘 감시해야 한다. \n\n“아저씨, 집에 혹시 막내 안 필요해?”\n\n우여곡절 끝에 제베르트 공작가의 막내로 들어가는 데엔 성공했다.\n하지만 난 레비아탄이 혐오하는 ‘마법사’라는 것\n+탈영한 소년병이라는 것\n+오해로 성별까지 바꿨으니\n들켜서 쫓겨나지 않으려면 조심, 또 조심 해야 하는데…\n\n이 집안 사람들, 잠시도 나를 가만두지 않는다.\n레비아탄을 지킬 방법을 찾는 것만으로도 바쁘지만\n일단 딸기 케이크부터 먹고… 그래, 맛있어!"},"links":{"al":"203960","ap":"the-youngest-has-many-secrets","mu":"oy8fmvm","nu":"the-youngest-hides-a-lot","raw":"https://page.kakao.com/content/68042237"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

When Sanshirou’s grandfather tells of a promise made long ago to a family friend he tells Sanshirou it is time to go to the city and meet the girl Sanshirou is engaged to. He comes home one day to find his sister Mifumi arguing with his grandfather about an arranged marraige to a boy with the same name as him. He believes this is his way out of being the top fighter in the doujo and he welcomes the pending arrival of this new Sanshirou as his ticket out of there.\nOkay, two problems (and you knew that they would be there). One, Sugata Sanshirou is a girl, and two, she’s determined and honor bound to become the wife of the only son at the Doujou – namely, Toyotomi Sanshirou.\nOh, and one more thing – she’s stronger than everyone else at the Doujou combined. Perhaps stronger than everyone in the city combined…\nThis is a fun series, with crazy artwork that’s fun to look at, horrible puns (the visual pun in volume one about Hulk Hogan is hilarious), great fights, high school life… a good start to the new year. Enjoy!"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/dp/B084NWS818?binding=kindle_edition","bw":"series/233540/list","mu":"47ne0rm"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

For Shuraka to claim the throne, however, he must survive an uprising that threatens the kingdom - once that forces him to draw the blood of his own brothers. Moved by the courage and gentle integrity of his betrothed, Tei pledges to protect him at any cost…and in the quiet hours of a white night, two hearts caught between loyalty and longing begin to bloom.","ru":"Дабы скрепить союз двух государств, наследному принцу знойной пустынной Арнаты и маркграфу северной снежной Леракл суждено сочетаться узами брака.\nЕдва Чёрный Волк Леракла, Тэй, ступает на землю Арнаты, как его встречает юный наследный принц Шурака."},"links":{"al":"203247","ap":"blossoms-of-the-white-night","engtl":"https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/whitenight","mal":"189145","mu":"u5bbj4z","raw":"https://www.bomtoon.com/detail/White_Night"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

The only person she could open her heart to was her childhood friend, Hinako. However, on the night of the Minazuki Festival in 1984, Hinako mysteriously disappeared. Everyone in the village claimed it was a “kamikakushi”—a divine abduction—and they made little effort to search for her.\n\nYears passed, and in 1988, Hinako suddenly returned… looking exactly the same as she did four years earlier. After her “return,” Hinako faces fear and rejection from the villagers and slowly becomes isolated. Determined to protect her no matter what, Sora stays by her side. But soon, disturbing mysteries surrounding the town and Hinako’s disappearance begin to surface…","es-la":"La estudiante de secundaria Sora Ueno vive en un pequeño pueblo de montaña, pero nunca se ha sentido realmente a gusto allí. La única persona a la que podía abrirle su corazón era su amiga de la infancia, Hinako. Sin embargo, la noche del Festival Minazuki de 1984, Hinako desapareció misteriosamente. Todos los habitantes del pueblo afirmaron que se trataba de un «kamikakushi» —un rapto divino— y no realizaron muchos esfuerzos por buscarla. Pasaron los años y, en 1988, Hinako regresó de repente... exactamente igual que cuatro años atrás. However, as \"ominous\" spiritual events begin to escalate and shadow both men, they are forced to confront dark spirits and Doyeon’s own traumatic past."},"links":{"raw":"https://ridibooks.com/books/3093001500"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"pornographic","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"320831a8-4026-470b-94f6-8353740e6f04","name":{"en":"Official Colored"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}}]}

d17ffa97-6ef5-4e61-b0cd-3a736fb4ac14:::||@!@||:::2026-01-19T02:20:46:::||@!@||:::{"id":"d17ffa97-6ef5-4e61-b0cd-3a736fb4ac14","title":{"en":"Hei Bei Revelations"},"altTitles":[{"zh":"黑背启示录"}],"description":{"en":"This work recounts Hei Bei’s (the author’s) “reform” journey from elementary school through junior high, so you’ll finally understand that the highest realm of sword practice is: “no sword in hand, yet a sword in the heart.” In other words, it’s the story of a weak little troublemaking kid who, to avoid being bullied, works hard to become the kind of troublemaking kid who bullies others…\n\nThis book also presents the most dangerous, nonstop, parody “ultimate moves” ever. Meanwhile, Cosmos still engaged to Irene—begins to falter in the face of her sudden coldness. Between these two men, will Irene succeed in carrying out her revenge?","pt-br":"Irene, esposa de um nobre de baixa patente no Reino de Westaria, recebe uma notícia devastadora: seus pais faleceram. 247d477a-da75-4f1c-b580-9e03511d44a0:::||@!@||:::2026-01-19T02:21:05:::||@!@||:::{"id":"247d477a-da75-4f1c-b580-9e03511d44a0","title":{"ko-ro":"Greedy"},"altTitles":[{"en":"Greedy"},{"ko":"그리 디"},{"pt-br":"Ambicioso"},{"ko":"그리디"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["pt-br"],"description":{"en":"The engagement was called off.\nA single wedding invitation—printed with the man who broke off the engagement and her best friend of ten years.\n\nAt thirty-one, Han Yuju walks away from both love and friendship.\nAll she has left is a five-year stint as a junior editor at a fashion magazine— a job where she can’t even put her name on a single column.\nNothing in her life—work or love—goes the way she wants.\n\nThen Go Tae-i appears.\nA man who lives in the spotlight.\nA glamorous face plastered across billboards— yet soaked in tears in an unexpectedly fragile moment.\n\nDuring an interview, Tae-i confesses a dangerous secret to Yuju.\n\n**“I’m going to die soon. The odds are probably fifty-fifty. So go ahead—use me. Stop pretending to be good.”**\n\nHis careless tone, the way he breaks down and endures— it all feels eerily similar to Yuju herself.\nA golden ticket that drops into her despair without warning.\nIs it a stroke of luck… or a trap?\nAfraid to reach out, Yuju is left to choose.\n\n**What should she do?**\n\n(Source: AniList, edited)","pt-br":"O noivado foi desfeito. Tudo o que faltava era um convite de casamento com a foto do homem com quem ela havia sido noiva, ao lado de sua melhor amiga de dez anos. Com isso, aos trinta e um anos, Han Yujoo jogou fora tanto o amor quanto a amizade. Tudo o que restou foi a triste realidade de ser editora júnior em uma revista de moda por cinco anos. Alguém cujo nome sequer merecia figurar em uma única linha de uma coluna.\n\nNada em sua vida, nem no trabalho nem no amor, jamais saiu como ela desejava. Então, Goh Taei apareceu diante de Yujoo. Um homem que vivia sob os holofotes. Um rosto deslumbrante estampado em outdoors por toda parte. Contudo, em uma entrevista, ele revelou um lado inesperado, com os olhos marejados de lágrimas, e confessou um segredo a Yujoo em particular.\n\n“Vou morrer em breve. Minha carreira provavelmente já está na metade. Então me use. Pare de fingir que é legal.” O jeito como ele falava, como se não tivesse mais nada a perder, e a maneira como ele suportava a ruína e a sobrevivência da mesma forma, parecia estranhamente semelhante à própria Yujoo.\n\nUm bilhete dourado caiu em seu colo em uma situação desesperadora. To secure a place where she belonged, she endured cruelty, devoted herself to her studies, and swallowed her sorrow. But when her fiancé was stolen by her older sister, it became the final betrayal. Lisette abandoned her family and carved out a new path, becoming a lady-in-waiting at the royal palace. Through her skill and perseverance, she earned the respect of the queen and the court nobles, finally finding the happiness she truly deserved. However, in the shadows, her youngest sister was plotting against her—determined to ruin everything Lisette had built… Will Lisette be able to outmaneuver the schemes set against her? Or will her past continue to haunt her new life? A story of revenge, healing, and courtly intrigue begins!"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/暮間チカ-ebook/dp/B0FX3WZ9RK/ref=books_amazonstores_desktop_mfs_aufs_ap_sc_dsk_0?_encoding=UTF8\u0026pd_rd_w=iHiY3\u0026content-id=amzn1.sym.d92bf30d-b14d-4e12-90b7-cccab62c9d99\u0026pf_rd_p=d92bf30d-b14d-4e12-90b7-cccab62c9d99\u0026pf_rd_r=357-4731539-4408868\u0026pd_rd_wg=9hvrc\u0026pd_rd_r=224774e5-62de-480c-b2eb-20a4651a4037","bw":"de98a3eac9-b39e-449f-80f1-8365c4d39a36","mu":"fe7gqch","raw":"https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/manga/official/323000667"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}
